annotation_sentence: Hi! Um, everything is okay. But I feel a bit... tired these days. Yeah.

annotation_sentence: Hmm, not really. I sleep maybe... five hours a night? Busy with work.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I know. But hard to find time. How you manage your time?

annotation_sentence: Exercise, yes. I think I should do more. I sit at desk all day.

annotation_sentence: Ah, yes, water. I sometimes forget. Maybe put bottle on desk, hmm?

annotation_sentence: I like fruits. Maybe I bring some to work for snack.
